backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining data models, maps, and authorized CRUD/query logic for benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated feature evidence report listing localization-related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for many frontend source files used in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens, theming variables, and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application entry defining routing trees, providers, protected layouts, and error boundaries.
Guard component that checks admin status and shows i18n-based loading or access-denied messages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a user-friendly fallback UI with reload option when runtime errors occur.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Component ensuring a backend actor is available, showing loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Redirects unauthenticated users to sign‑in and shows loading or sign‑in prompts before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Renders a draggable list with visual drag states and delegates reordering logic to parent callbacks.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Provides state and handlers for drag‑and‑drop list reordering, including drag tracking and item repositioning.
Defines the main app layout with navigation, theme toggle, user menu, and sign‑out handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows scroll‑to‑top and scroll‑to‑bottom buttons based on scroll position and performs smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Lets users enter or select a single entity tag with suggestions, keyboard handling, and validation UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Displays a grid of predefined avatars and lets the user pick one, highlighting the selected option.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom images with cache‑busting and size options.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Toggles the app’s light/dark theme using next‑themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
Zustand store providing a timestamp‑based cache‑buster for avatar URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the dashboard chart type in localStorage with a simple setter.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity state, and status flags.
Sends periodic heartbeat updates to the backend using the authenticated actor, running every minute when identity is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, test benches, roles, and expiration preferences.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state management, loading preferences from backend or local storage and allowing language updates.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helpers to validate or look up languages by code.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Exports a large union type listing all translation keys used throughout the application.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Offers a translation hook that resolves keys based on the current language and provides language management helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for benches, documents, and users, using translated labels.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches with loading state and supports deleting a selected bench via a confirmation dialog.
Lists all documents with metadata and provides a download action with loading and error handling.
Shows the current user's profile, expiration settings, and dashboard preferences with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Shows detailed bench info, components, documents, history, and supports editing, removing, and duplicating components.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Displays searchable bench cards, handles loading and empty states, and allows opening the add‑bench modal.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Form modal for creating a new bench, handling metadata inputs, photo upload, validation, tags, components, and duplication options.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editor table for adding, editing, removing, and duplicating bench components with status calculation.
Manages bench documents by uploading, associating, versioning, and deleting files grouped by category.
Displays a sorted list of bench history entries with user info and timestamps.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallback handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Input component for managing document categories and their associated uploaded files and versions.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog for selecting benches and duplicating a component to them using mutation hooks, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal for editing bench details, handling form validation, photo uploads, and updating the bench via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component allowing adding, removing, and selecting from suggested tags with filtering and keyboard support.
Placeholder page describing upcoming bench creation features with a coming‑soon notice.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Pie chart card summarizing component expiration statuses across benches using threshold logic and i18n.
Bar chart showing counts of components by expiration status per bench, dynamically labeled with i18n.
Bar chart grouping components by expiration date ranges and displaying counts per range.
Pie chart displaying distribution of documents by category with color-coded segments.
Builds a monthly expiration count dataset from component dates and renders it as a bar or line chart.
Computes expired component counts per bench using threshold rules and displays them in a bar or line chart.
Calculates overall component health percentages and shows them as progress bars.
Defines and orders statistic and chart cards for the dashboard, including draggable layout support.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads bench, component, and document data to render the main dashboard with charts, stats, and reorderable sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile editing including identity, thresholds, avatars, language, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Sign‑in page that triggers Internet Identity login, shows errors, and redirects authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Defines a map of avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to fetch avatar paths and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Converts uploaded files into ExternalBlob objects with optional upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Loads a default bench placeholder image and converts it into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads an ExternalBlob as a file by creating a temporary blob URL and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error types into readable messages with sensible fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold settings using local storage and user profile data, and computes expiration statuses.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates simple unique IDs using timestamps and random strings.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Applies deterministic text cleanup and formatting to bench descriptions, including capitalization and abbreviation normalization.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Searches test benches by matching query terms against name, code, description, and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Reads, stores, and persists URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates email, domain‑specific email, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node‑side tooling with ESNext modules and Vite config inclusion.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variable injection, path aliases, API proxying, and build settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known i18n issues, and feature requests for localizing the Admin area and Bench history view. Includes existing features, pending requests, and project configuration details.
